title: Any ideas? Been looking for ages
content:
Hi all, new here, I’m looking for this font which is like a mix of Avant Garde and Bauhaus... but I’m lost as to what it is!

If anyone could help it would be much appreciated

author: dj89

comments.content: yeah i have thought of that but the R is different in Chalet... more helvetica style as opposed to what the mystery font is
